code: import{Box,FormControl,TextField}from"@mui/material";import React,{useState}from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{handleAmountChange}from"../redux/actions";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TextFieldComp=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const[value,setValue]=useState("");const handleChange=e=>{const input=e.target.value;const numericInput=input.replace(/[^0-9]/g,"");setValue(numericInput);dispatch(handleAmountChange(numericInput));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{mt:3,width:"100%",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormControl,{fullWidth:true,size:"small",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Number of Questions",type:"text",value:value,onChange:handleChange})})});};export default TextFieldComp;
